name: IRIS Web Technologies
description:
IRIS Web Technologies is a proficient website design & internet marketing company based in Chandigarh, the capital of Punjab and Haryana (India). The company was formed in 2014 with firm determination and hard work by the founder and current CEO Mr Karan Singh. As a well established Chandigarh web design company, our current client database includes businesses throughout the India, UK, USA, Canada as well as other countries.
The company offers an extensive range of services to reach your targeted spectators and carve up your information focusing on retaining your customers. Our service includes website design, web development, e-commerce solutions, app development, search engine optimisation (SEO) & Internet marketing. The promoters share a common vision to provide Best-in-Class website design & internet marketing services to clients all over the world. Our mission is always to create a website exceeding in quality every time by providing best design according to the parameters of Google. As a company and every individual in the team, we value integrity, honesty, loyalty and hard work and welcome inquiries from India, USA, UK or from any other country in the world.
